LanguageData.CYO.NoApparels: No Apparels for this body part
LanguageData.CYO.AddBillsConfirm.Desc: Try to add the bills that make selected apparels to the worktables.\nDo you really want to run it?
LanguageData.CYO.AddBillsConfirm.RestrictToPreviewedA: Register only the apparel specified for preview.
LanguageData.CYO.AddBillsConfirm.ForceRegister: Apparel that its bill is already registered will also be registered.
LanguageData.CYO.AddBills.NoRecipes: There are no recipes available now to make this apparel.
LanguageData.CYO.AddBills.NoWorkTables: There are no worktables to make this apparel on this map.
LanguageData.CYO.AddBills.AlreadyRegistered: The bill to make this apparel is already registered.
LanguageData.CYO.Settings.CollapseByLayer: Selected apparel Lists are collapsed by layer as default.
LanguageData.CYO.Settings.SyncFilter: Sync selected apparels to filters in real time (If this is off, sync with button).
LanguageData.CYO.Settings.FilterLoadTiming: Set the timing of filter loading to "when the mouse button is clicked".\n(This is effective when the load filter is called every tick due to invalid apparel)
LanguageData.CYO.Settings.ApparelListMode: Hide apparel that cannot be worn together with the selected apparels.
LanguageData.CYO.Settings.IgnoreBillLimit: Ignore the maximum number of bills.
